content: to last 3 sts k3 row 30 ws k3 purl to last 3 sts k3 row 3 rs k4 k3 m1 k4 m1 k3 7 times 46 cm/18 size go to row 35 k4 total 92 sts row 4 & all ws row k3 purl to last 3 sts k3 51 cm/20 only row 31 rs k4 k10 m1 k4 m1 k10 7 times now you have the option to work short row as k4 total 190 sts in the box below if you wish to omit them then row 32 ws k3 purl to last 3 sts k3 go to row 5 instead row 33 rs knit short row optional row 34 ws k3 purl to last 3 sts k3 row 4a rs knit 63 w+t p34 w+t knit to all sizes end of row picking up the wrap as you come row 35 rs k24 27 30 m1l pm m1r k34 to it 36 38 m1l pm m1r k46 50 54 m1l pm row 4b ws k3 purl to last 3 sts picking up m1r k34 36 38 m1l pm m1r k24 27 30 the wrap as you come to it k3 total 170 184 198 sts go to row 7 row 36 ws k3 purl to last 3 sts k3 © janet cullen 2013 simnia cardigan ~ 4 ~ sleeve separation sleeves both alike return sleeve stitches to larger diameter row 37 rs knit to marker remove marker circular needles or dpns and put next 36 38 40 sts on hold for sleeve with rs facing and starting at the underarm remove marker cast on 2 4 4 sts knit to pick up and knit 2 3 4 sts pm pick up and marker remove marker put next 36 38 40 knit 2 3 4 sts knit across sleeve sts to 3 4 sts on hold for sleeve remove marker cast on 2 5 sts before marker ssk k1 2 3 sm k1 2 4 4 sts knit to end of row 3 k2tog knit to marker total 102 116 126 sts total 38 42 46 sts knit 4 rounds skirt decrease round k2 k2tog knit to 4 sts before work an increase row for your size as follows marker ssk k2 2 sts decreased 40 5 cm/16 only ws k6 m1 k3 repeat to last 6 sts m1 k6 repeat the decrease round every 5th round total 133 sts until 26 28 30 sts remain knit until the sleeve measures 12 5 14 15 46 cm/18 only cm/5 5 5 6 inches from the underarm area ws k7 m1 k3 repeat to last 7 sts m1 k7 total 156 sts change to smaller diameter needles round 1 purl 51 cm/20 only round 2 knit ws k3 m1 k2 m1 k3 m1 24 times k3 repeat round 1 & 2 until sleeve measures 14 total 175 sts 15 5 16 5 cm/5 5 6 6 5 inches ending with round 1 all sizes row 1 rs k3
